import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card } from "react-bootstrap"; import Rating from "../Rating"; import products from "../products"; const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const product = products.find((p) => p._id == match.params.id); return (
Go back

 Price: ${product.price} Description:{product.description} Price: ${product.price} Status: {product.countInStock>0 ? 'In Stock':'out of stock'}
); }; export default ProductScreen;
